alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 10:01PM CST until February 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1045 PM CST. * At 1000 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Indianola, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Indianola... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
